thread.title: World stocks set for positive April

title: World stocks set for positive April
text:
World stocks set for positive April 9:43am EDT - 01:43
World stocks are set to notch up a positive month for the first time since January, as a slew of positive earnings from U.S. technology firms and marquee M&A deals help soothe memories of February tremors. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
World stocks are set to notch up a positive month for the first time since January, as a slew of positive earnings from U.S. technology firms and marquee M&A deals help soothe memories of February tremors.
